commandScriptLinux:
mkdir out
echo "Written to standard output: ${in:parameters}"
echo \""${in:parameters}"\" >out/params.txt
echo "Written to output file: ${in:parameters}"
echo Input path: "${in:input}"
# find "${in:input}"
find "${in:input}" >out/listing.txt
echo Input listing file written
mkdir out/subdir
echo "subdir file content" >out/subdir/subdirfile.txt
commandScriptWindows:
mkdir out
echo Written to standard output: "${in:parameters}"
echo "${in:parameters}" >out\params.txt
echo Written to output file: "${in:parameters}"
echo Input path: "${in:input}"
rem dir /s /b "${in:input}"
dir /s /b "${in:input}" >out\listing.txt
echo nput listing file written
mkdir out\subdir
echo "subdir file content" >out\subdir\subdirfile.txt
